cards.title: Switch modality
steps: Use text chat while images/voice recover
cards.caution: Avoid repeated retries if errors persist.

cards.title: Try a lighter model
steps: Switch to a smaller or faster model
cards.caution: Don't spam retries; back off if errors continue.

cards.title: Quick login checks
steps: Wait a few minutes and retry
cards.caution: Avoid repeated password resets while the issue persists.

cards.title: Back off retries
cards.caution: Aggressive retries can make throttling worse.
